870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (13:55): 1e9582d0218a34b09caef2d8b5a9800b: i was just going to ask you about the new hg templating stuff, but there was enough info in the bug
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (13:56): 1e9582d0218a34b09caef2d8b5a9800b: cshields is working on upgrading hg.mo to 2.0.1
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:01): 870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a: did you read roc's blog post?
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:02): probably not?
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:02): link?
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:02): 870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a: could happen as soon as this week
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:02): 42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad: what, the hg update?
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:03): yeah
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:03): 870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a: http://robert.ocallahan.org/2011/12/case-for-non-fatal-assertions.html
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:03): 42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad: yeah, he roped me in yesterday to test some things
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:04): it's live on hgstage
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:04): there are a few things busted at the moment, some of it just needs a hg_templates update, i think
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:04): ok
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:04): http://hgstage.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:04): I should point some build slaves at it
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:04): pushlog is clearly busted
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:04): although I don't imagine they'll have issues...
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:04): 42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad: it's on a super slow VM
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:04): is there any other kind?
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:05): 5360af35bde9ebd8f01f492dc059593c says that the new VM setup they have in PHX is pretty nice
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:06): 81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b: ah, thanks
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:07): 870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a: I think he answered most of what your latest email says
870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a (14:07): blast

5360af35bde9ebd8f01f492dc059593c (14:08): It's an ESXi 5 Cluster which can migrate VMs from overloaded hosts and  where the hosts have 10Gbs connections to the NetApp storage that is distinct from the other network connections. That compares to the common scenario before where there was at most 1Gbps network adapter than was used for all network access including the NetApps disk storage.
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:12): auto migration can be a PITA
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:12): I guess it depends on your workload

5360af35bde9ebd8f01f492dc059593c (14:15): I don't know that I've experienced too much migration so far apart from some tests. I think the biggest issue was fixing the networking. The benefit for the migration is not getting into a situation where some hosts are perenially overloaded while others sit idle.
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:15): yeah
5360af35bde9ebd8f01f492dc059593c (14:15): I would imagine with a fairly constant load the VMs will distribute across the hosts and not continually move around.
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:16): if your processes (and clients of those processes) can handle being paused briefly, then it can work
1e9582d0218a34b09caef2d8b5a9800b (14:16): 870fa8ee962d90af50c7eaed792b075a: should be nice to have that
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:16): no heycam and no Ms2ger
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:16): wonders who he's supposed to consult about WebIDL
332fb85b4d0f64d0e0d1ef0d34ebcbe7 (14:22): hands 81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b a 'magic 8 ball'
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:25): shakes it
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:25): "take more PTO"
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (14:25): nice response
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:26): wow, 'hg out' with hg 1.6 generates 1.5 MB of traffic. With 2.0 it uses 120k
a38ec82c62af264c0a0768d1a2dcec22 (14:27): what version do we run on hg.m.o?
42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad (14:28): 1.5 I think
a38ec82c62af264c0a0768d1a2dcec22 (14:30): hm, it isn't even listed on the release notes page

5360af35bde9ebd8f01f492dc059593c (14:30): 42bea5914051e9a2d1dcddcc986a4fad: Dan Parsons is the go to guy for esx and the cluster I'm on. I recommend talking to him. I think the perceptions people have built up about VMs might be out of date when they are deployed properly. I think there is a good chance for a win for you guys.
